caption.title: Comparison of the performance of NCE-based policies under the situations of with/without within-host evolutionary dynamics.
caption.p: Here r is the diversification rate of within-host virus population. The solid lines ( r = 0 lineage/day) and the dashed lines ( r = 1 lineage/day) are the results with/without within-host diversity respectively. The performance of the NCE â©¾ m policy is measured by the relative effect over random prevention (please see text for definition). Three levels of threshold m are calculated: m = 1 (blue), m = 2 (orange), and m = 2 (green).
